data_table.description: Death Certificate Form, DTH. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: DTHA07
variable.description: [Information from death index/certificate]. Marital status. Q7 [Death Certificate Form, DTH]

variable.name: DTHA12
variable.description: [Information from death index/certificate]. Where did the decedent die? Q12 [Death Certificate Form, DTH]
variable.value: Hospital out of catchment area or location unknown

variable.name: DTHA13
variable.description: [Information from death index/certificate]. If decedent died in hospital. Q13 [Death Certificate Form, DTH]

variable.name: DTHA19A
variable.description: [Information from death index/certificate]. 1st death certificate ICD-10 code. Q19a [Death Certificate Form, DTH]

variable.name: DTHA19G
variable.description: [Information from death index/certificate]. 7th death certificate ICD-10 code. Q19g [Death Certificate Form, DTH]

variable.name: DTHA19B
variable.description: [Information from death index/certificate]. 2nd death certificate ICD-10 code. Q19b [Death Certificate Form, DTH]

variable.name: DTHA19H
variable.description: [Information from death index/certificate]. 8th death certificate ICD-10 code. Q19h [Death Certificate Form, DTH]

variable.name: DTHA19C
variable.description: [Information from death index/certificate]. 3rd death certificate ICD-10 code. Q19c [Death Certificate Form, DTH]

variable.name: DTHA19I
variable.description: [Information from death index/certificate]. 9th death certificate ICD-10 code. Q19i [Death Certificate Form, DTH]

variable.name: DTHA19D
variable.description: [Information from death index/certificate]. 4th death certificate ICD-10 code. Q19d [Death Certificate Form, DTH]

variable.name: DTHA19J
variable.description: [Information from death index/certificate]. 10th death certificate ICD-10 code. Q19j [Death Certificate Form, DTH]

variable.name: DTHA19E
variable.description: [Information from death index/certificate]. 5th death certificate ICD-10 code. Q19e [Death Certificate Form, DTH]

variable.name: DTHA19F
variable.description: [Information from death index/certificate]. 6th death certificate ICD-10 code. Q19f [Death Certificate Form, DTH]

variable.name: DTHA22
variable.description: [Information from death index/certificate]. Interval between onset and death for immediate cause of death. Q22 [Death Certificate Form, DTH]

variable.name: DTHA24
variable.description: [Information from death index/certificate]. Relationship of informant to deceased. Q24 [Death Certificate Form, DTH]

variable.name: DTHA10
variable.description: [Information from death index/certificate]. Computed age at death. Q10 [Death Certificate Form, DTH]

variable.name: DTHAFLAG
variable.description: =1 if DTHA (or later version) is present [Death Certificate Form, DTH]

variable.name: DTHA07A
variable.description: [Information from death index/certificate]. Was decedent a veteran? Q7a [Death Certificate Form, DTH]

variable.name: FORMVER
variable.description: Form version

variable.name: DTHZ18
variable.description: Underlying cause of death

variable.name: DTH2Z18
variable.description: Modified 06/04 death ICD code

variable.name: DTHA09_DAYS
variable.description: Date of death, days from exam 1

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC occurrence ID
